entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpwukn7a8a\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0108.9564] The concept us-gaap:ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment with a period duration starting on 2020-08-29 and ending on 2020-09-20 or 22 days with a reported value of 25,100,000 has a value greater than the value of the same element with a longer or equivalent period duration that starts on 2020-02-29 and ends on 2020-11-28 with a value of 23,724,000. The value 25,100,000 for the period of 22 days should be less or the same as the value 23,724,000 with a duration of 273 days assuming that the concept us-gaap:ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment cannot have a negative value. If the difference between the two numbers is insignificant, check that the decimals of the two values are appropriate. The decimal value of 25,100,000 is -5, and the decimals of 23,724,000 is -3.
The properties of this us-gaap:ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment fact are: Period :2020-08-30 to 2020-09-20 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9564 Rule version: 16.0.0RC5 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/6845/000000684521000003/apog-20201128.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
